packageName: Rain Bird LNK/LNK2 WiFi Module Controller
author: Marc Hedish
releaseNotes:
Added manual child device creation command and explicit child driver (Rain Bird LNK/LNK2 Zone Child). This release establishes automatic child management with a self-healing, user-initiated process for improved reliability.

0.1.3.1 – Added duration parameter support to RunZone().
0.1.3.0 – Introduced zone child device creation framework.
0.1.3.2 – Legacy updates, telemetry improvements, and documentation enhancements.
0.1.3.3 - Fixed child device creation.

drivers.name: Rain Bird LNK/LNK2 WiFi Module Controller
